pages.text: $(li)The Cave Centipede Leg can be used to craft the $(l:patchouli:armors/cave_centipede_leggings)Cave Centipede Leggings$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be used to brew a $(l:patchouli:potions/alexsmobs/poison_resistance)Potion of Poison Resistance$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/brewing_stand)Brewing Stand$(/l) too.
$(li)This item can only be dropped by a $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/cave_centipede)Cave Centipede$(/l) on death.
